long_description.value:
__Available to all Zendesk Customers__

Available for all Zendesk Suite and Support Plans, with no minimum number of subscribed Agents, no minimum subscription period for any Agent, and your first month free for all subscribed Agents.

__Secure, same day, automatic redaction of all Payment Card Information in English__

A sophisticated, AI-assisted voice transcription engine provides secure automatic redaction of all Payment Card Information spoken in English from the Zendesk call recording held in a Zendesk Support Ticket.  Accurately remove payment card details and reduce liabilities associated with both external and internal threats.

__Minimizes the period of time recordings are present in-clear__

GPU-accelerated, cloud-based transcription and redaction is followed by immediate replacement of the original unredacted recording on the Zendesk Support Ticket.

__Optimizes the user experience for your Zendesk Agents__

Processed recordings appear in the same manner as the original on the Zendesk Support ticket with full original call metadata.

A highlighted comment indicates whether redactions were made or not, enabling distinct post-call workflows based on PCI detection and redaction or not via Zendesk event triggers.

__Simple, competitive pricing__

10 USD per month per PCI-handling Zendesk Talk Agent, from month two onwards, with no charge for Support-only Agents, or for Zendesk Talk Agents who don't handle PCI in English.

__Full support for Seasonal Demand Variations and Joiners, Movers & Leavers__

Addition and removal of Users is under your own control inside Zendesk, all the way down to zero Users at zero cost for any closed season, and with any partial months for a User pro-rata'd.

__Try before you buy__

Free 1 month trial available by clicking the Free Trial button on the top right of the screen and then following the 'How to install' tab.

To schedule a quick walkthrough, or for any questions, reach out to us at support@meetmyna.com
